amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used by the Consumer Product Safety Commission to finalize, implement, or enforce the proposed rule entitled "Voluntary Remedial Actions and Guidelines for Voluntary Recall Notices" (CPSC Docket No. CPSC-2013-0040).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds by the Consumer Product Safety Commission to finalize, implement, or enforce the proposed rule entitled "Voluntary Remedial Actions and Guidelines for Voluntary Recall Notices".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A042) Agreed to by recorded vote: 229 - 194 (Roll no. 424).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A042) Agreed to by recorded vote: 229 - 194 (Roll no. 424).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A042) offered by Mrs. Blackburn.
